title: Preview Worker: Implement Job Status & API Endpoints
body:
## Description
Provide endpoints to query job status and results.

## Priority
P0

## Estimated Effort
4-6 hours

## API Endpoints
- POST /api/preview -> existing endpoint returns 202 and jobId if accepted (or 429 if queue full).
- GET /api/preview/:jobId/status -> { status: queued|running|success|failed, progress, artifactUrls: [], logs_url }.
- GET /api/preview/:jobId/artifact -> stream/download artifact (auth controlled).

## Acceptance Criteria
- Endpoints implemented and documented; GET status returns 200 and correct status after enqueuing test jobs.

## Labels
feature, phase-g, preview-worker, backend, api
## Assignee
developer
